titles: Charles, by the grace of God, King of Scotland, England, France and Ireland, defender of the faith. To our lovits [blank] heraulds messengers, our sheriffs in that part, conjunctly and severally specially constitute greeting. Forsameikle as wee are not ignorant of the great disorders ...
author: Scotland. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
notes: Concerning canons, the service book, etc.
Dated at end: Greenwich the twenty eighth day of June .. 1638.
Arms 221; Steele notation: the so twenty.
